thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com
thread.title: Rafael de Ory
thread.title_full: TicketCity reviewed by Rafael de Ory

author: Rafael de Ory
title: Rafael de Ory
text:
Very high commissions, delivery fees, etc. that increase the final price of the ticket by more than 30%.
And you don't let the prospective buyer know about all these 'extras' until the credir card information is not entered.
This is pretty close to a legal scam.
Dissapointing experience.
